markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Able Ritualist](/Feats.aspx?ID=2662) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #164: Hands of the Devil](/Sources.aspx?ID=75) pg. 76</row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Researcher](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=89)

**Prerequisites**
[Eldritch Researcher Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2658)

</column>

---

Your readings on rituals make you a skilled participant. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to primary and secondary checks you attempt as part of casting a ritual.
name: Able Ritualist
